Checks to see if the current mouse position is over this widget.

Returns:

String phys::UI::CheckBox::GetLabelText (  )  [virtual]

Gets the currently set label being displayed with this widget.

Returns:
Returns a string containing the currently set label. If no label is set this will return an empty string.

Vector2 phys::UI::CheckBox::GetPosition (  )  [virtual]

Gets the relative position of this widget.

The position is relative to the screen size. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.

Returns:
Returns a vector2 representing the relative position of this widget.

void phys::UI::CheckBox::SetCheckedSprite ( String &  Checked,
String &  Hovered = "" 
) [virtual]

Sets the checked status sprite and an optional checked hovered sprite.

Parameters:
Unchecked The name of the sprite in the Atlas you wish to set as the checked status sprite.
Hovered The name of the sprite in the Atlas you with to sed on the checked/hovered sprite. Leaving this to default or passing in a blank string will cause it to ignore this parameter.

Definition at line 165 of file uicheckbox.cpp.

void phys::UI::CheckBox::SetLabelText ( String &  LabelText  )  [virtual]

Sets the text label to be displayed with this widget.

If a label hasn't been set when this is called, this funtion will create a new one and set it.

Parameters:
Label The text message to display with this widget.

String &  Hovered = ""

Sets the unchecked status sprite and an optional unchecked hovered sprite.

Parameters:

Hovered The name of the sprite in the Atlas you with to sed on the unchecked/hovered sprite. Leaving this to default or passing in a blank string will cause it to ignore this parameter.
